nodes.text: MREM-02, or Moreemohtwo was a kitchen droid owned by Corpo the Hutt. When Corpo enslaved famous chef Slabba Drewl, Jedi Masters Micah Giiett and Plo Koon came to his rescue. Corpo then bet Drewl in a cooking contest with MREM-02. While Giiett distracted the audience, Koon swapped the ingredients. When Micah's Squirmer Stew won the competition, Corpo started hitting Moreemohtwo, causing it to fall over.
The name "Moreemohtwo" is derived from Iron Chef Japanese Masaharu Morimoto.[source?]
